Articles.Content:
Shortly after launch at the altitude of 2000-2100m I'm losing control not only of my rocket but of my game as well. Stages disappers, RemoteTech loses connection, keyboard stops working and picture degrades to 4-10 FPS. Though, the rocket continues to fly without any thrust but with persistent speed. Due to keyboard shutdow (in game) I am unable to revert the flight, so the only way to stop this mess is process killing.

I'm using a lot of mods, so I'm ready to provide any additional information along with the screenshots if needed.
